name: Parallax (itch) (Daneel Cayce)
description:
"Just here for a job interview. Elwood Electric."

"Really? I don't think I know anybody who works there. Actually, I thought the place was closed down. I never see anybody go in or out of that building. No cars in the parking lot or anything. When I was a kid, we used to think the place was haunted."

"Parallax" is a text adventure prototype -- an intro to a game that doesn't yet exist, but might in the future. I wrote it in a month. There's a lot of bugs.
